feed.title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?

entry.title: Who will run the CoinJoin coordinators?
entry.summary: A recent development has enabled the Trezor Suite application to support CoinJoin transactions with alternative coordinators. This advancement comes with a comprehensive guide detailing the setup process, which can be found at [Change Coordinator (kravens.nl)](https://wasabi.kravens.nl/trezor). The essence of this method involves initiating the Trezor Suite app using a debug argument that specifies a custom coordinator server. An example provided for this configuration illustrates how to connect to the Noderunners Coordinator, demonstrating a practical application of this new capability. This update is significant for users seeking flexibility in their choice of coordinators for CoinJoin transactions within the Trezor Suite environment.
